settings.title: LPS Material Handling is the one-stop shop for all your equipment needs. We carry a variety of new, pre-owned, and re-manufactured equipment from the industry's leading brands such as: Hyundai, Blue Giant, BigDog, and Bob-Cat. Whether you are needing equipment, parts, or service we will assess and go over your needs with you to ensure that you are getting what best fits you and/or your company.
